resources.string: Hi, this is a new Netology! Once Netology began with intensive courses in online marketing. Then there were courses on design, development, analytics and management. We grow ourselves and help students grow: from beginners to confident professionals. But the most important thing remains with us: we believe that everyone already has the power that makes them want more, aim higher, run faster. Our mission is to help us embark on the path of growth and start a chain of changes - http://ntelo.gy/fyb
